title: Rick and Morty Character finder
description: In the main page you can see the list of 20 characters sorted by name and if you click on a character card you will get more details of it. What's your favourite?
technologies: ReactJs | React Router | hooks | Api | Javascript

title: Weather App
description: This is a side project which allows you to search the weather in different cities, add those locations to a favorite list, remove them and use the local storage to remeber your preferences.

title: Guess the number
description: Random number generator between 1 and 100 with different clues and an attempts counter.

title: Anonymous proxy
description: The exercise consists of developing a web page according to a design given in Zeplin.

title: Quinteto de $sudo
description: In this group website project we present the members of our $ sudo Quintet group to potential clients.
technologies: HTML | Sass | Flexbox | Grid | mobile first | transitions | git

title: KardMA - Card Maker App
description: Group project. This web application can be used to create business cards interactively and share them on Twitter.
technologies: HTML | Sass | Flexbox | Grid | mobile first | git | Javascript | localStorage
